parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Config

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns raw text from config entry. If entry is subject to [[localize | localization]], the translation key is returned. To obtain the [[isLocalized | localized]] text, see [[getText]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getTextRaw]] config

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> config: [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[String]] - raw text value

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_text = [[getTextRaw]] ([[configFile]] [[gtgt|>>]] "CfgVehicles" [[gtgt|>>]] "Thing" [[gtgt|>>]] "displayName"); <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"$STR_ACTION_GETIN_DRIVER"</value></part></template>
_key = _text [[select]] [1]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"STR_ACTION_GETIN_DRIVER"</value></part></template>
_localized = [[localize]] _key; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"Get in %1 as Driver"</value></part></template>
_localized == [[getText]] ([[configFile]] [[gtgt|>>]] "CfgVehicles" [[gtgt|>>]] "Thing" [[gtgt|>>]] "displayName"); <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[configFile]], [[config / name]], [[configName]], [[count]], [[getArray]], [[getNumber]], [[inheritsFrom]], [[isArray]], [[isClass]], [[isNumber]], [[isText]], [[select]], [[getText]], [[localize]], [[isLocalized]], [[diag_localized]]
</value></part></template></root>
